description: One of my favourite games. My grandkids love playing it... they enjoy blowing things up with the most destructive weapons... Briliant game!
For me the most entertaining game on linux. Small and not steam related.

summary: 10/10, best game on linux, would play for the rest of my life

description: this is such a well made 3d version of the scorched games, honestly suprised nobody else is playing this.
UI seems messed up, can't start a game.
seems to load but cannot play.
Every time I finish setup for a match, I get locked onto the loading screen. That keeps me from ever getting far enough to see anything good about this. Avoid.
Super fun! Love the ability to 3D rotate. Graphics are great.
summary: Way getter than the original! Love the 3D!

description: I loved playing scorched back in the day and this is a worthy upgrade. The 3d element was added in style.

Played this 20 years ago on Windows and have been trying to find it since. Glad to see it's still here but don't expect it to run well on modern hardware. 

You need to adjust settings for it to launch a match properly. I'd recommend setting all options to "Safe Mode" and then enabling things from there to see what you can safely run. For me, I had to check "No GL Extensions" to get the game running properly. Your mileage may vary though.
After switching to fullscreen mode, plasma(on X11) stoped outputing video.

A pesar de tener ya varios años, los escenarios 3D se ven geniales.
Especialmente divertido para quienes quieran hacer disparos con paciencia por turnos.
